title: Stocks: FedEx, Adobe, Chewy, General Mills All Fall Pre-Market
text:
Stocks: FedEx, Adobe, Chewy, General Mills All Fall Pre-Market

Stock Markets 10 hours ago (Sep 18, 2019 18:24)

© Reuters. Investing.com -- Stocks in focus in premarket trade Wednesday, 18th September. FedEx (NYSE: ) was down 10.7% after reporting a fall in operating income in its fiscal first quarter and cutting its guidance for the rest of the fiscal year, a result of a weakening macro backdrop and the end of its contract with Amazon.com (NASDAQ: ). United Parcel Service (NYSE: ) fell 2.6% in sympathy with its logistics rival. Adobe Systems (NASDAQ: ) was down 2.8%, after it too issued weaker-than-expected guidance in a third-quarter update that otherwise beat expectations Chewy (NYSE: ) was down 0.8% after saying revenue fell slightly short of forecasts in the quarter; its net loss narrowed slightly more than expected, however. General Mills (NYSE: ) fell 3.0% after reporting a decline in organic net sales in its fiscal first quarter; profit was 2% ahead of expectations. Lennar (NYSE: ) was down 0.3%, caught between an analyst downgrade and strong housing starts data that suggest the business outlook is still decent.

Stocks: FedEx, Adobe, Chewy, General Mills All Fall Pre-Market
description: Stocks: FedEx, Adobe, Chewy, General Mills All Fall Pre-Market
